
<h1 align="center">
  <br>
  <a href="https://2day4cast.vercel.app/"><img src="https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/948593362791968778/1177988524486709288/image.png?ex=6574824e&is=65620d4e&hm=b16198d8822e70cdf0ba2df47285ebebb4cadbb20266fc907b9ec4f6ce071b89&=&format=webp&width=1131&height=676" alt="2day4cast" width="200"></a>
  <br>
  <span style="font-size: 40px">2day4cast</span>
  <br>
</h1>

<h3 align="center">A real-time weather forecast web application built with <a href="https://nextjs.org/" target="_blank">Next.js</a> and <a href="https://ui.shadcn.com/" target="_blank">Shadcn UI</a> Utilizes the power of Google Maps API for Geocoding, <a href="https://openweathermap.org/" target="_blank">OpenWeatherMap</a> for weather data, and <a href="https://www.mapbox.com/" target="_blank">MapBox</a> for interactive map displays. A simple yet powerful tool for seamless weather updates and exploration.</h3>

<p align="center">
  <a href="https://nextjs.org/">
    <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/next.js-000000?style=for-the-badge&logo=nextdotjs&logoColor=white"

</p>

## Features

* Real-Time Weather Forecast
  - Provide fast and accurate information.
* Diverse Information
  - Temperature, wind speed/direction, air quality, rainfall, humidity, visibility, UV index, atmospheric pressure, and more.
* Hourly and 10-Day Forecast
  - Offer detailed insights into short-term and long-term weather conditions.
* Interactive Map
  - Display temperature, rainfall, and wind on the map for easy user tracking.
* UI/UX Design
  - Enhance user experience and attract a broad audience, optimizing revenue potential through advertising.
* API Integration
  - Collaborate with major providers such as OpenWeatherMap and MapBox to ensure highly authentic data.
* Search engine & Google Map API intergration
  - Incorporate a search bar through Google Map API including Geocoding, Reverse-Geocoding, Auto Complete, Suggestion. Enabling revenue generation through pay-per-click (PPC) or pay-per-impression (PPI) models.
* Dark/Light mode
* Search bar with AutoComplete and Suggestions
* Premium mode
* Responsive design
  - Suitable for PC, Laptop, Tablet or even Mobile.
* Cross platform
  - Windows, macOS and Linux ready.

## How To Use

To clone and run this application, you'll need [Git](https://git-scm.com) and [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/download/) (which comes with [npm](http://npmjs.com)) installed on your computer. From your command line:

```bash
# Clone this repository
$ git clone https://github.com/hoangxuanlam2007/2day4cast.git

# Target the directory location
$ cd 2day4cast

# Install dependencies
$ npm install

# Run the app with localhost
$ npm run dev
```

> **Note**
> For local development and testing from `localhost`, inside `action` folder, make sure to check that you're calling the API route using `http` not `https`.

> Don't forget to set up for Environment Variables, example:
```
VERCEL_URL=localhost:3000
NEXT_PUBLIC_GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY=
NEXT_PUBLIC_OPEN_WEATHER_API_KEY=
NEXT_PUBLIC_MAPBOX_ACCESS_TOKEN=
```


## Download

You can [download](https://github.com/hoangxuanlam2007/2day4cast) the latest update of this respository for Windows, macOS and Linux.
